### Strains by host


```{r}
p_host <- wb_all %>% 
  group_by(host_binomial) %>%
  summarise(n = length(labcode)) %>% 
  
  ggplot(aes(reorder(host_binomial, n), n))+
  geom_col(fill = "#558796")+
  geom_text(aes(reorder(host_binomial, n), n, label = n), size = 2, hjust = -0.1) +
  theme_minimal_grid(font_size = 9)+
  coord_flip()+
  theme(legend.position = "none", 
        #plot.margin = margin(1, 2, 2, 2, "cm"), 
        axis.text.y = element_text(face = "italic"))+
  labs(x = "", y = "Number of strains", title = "Host species")
  
p_host
  
```




### Strains by species

```{r echo=FALSE, layout="l-body-outset"}
library(janitor)

p_py <- wb_all %>% 
  filter(py_binomial != "NA") %>% 
  tabyl(py_binomial) %>% 
    
  ggplot(aes(reorder(py_binomial, n), n))+
  geom_col(fill = "#558796")+
  geom_text(aes(reorder(py_binomial, n), n, label = n), size = 2, hjust = -0.1) +
  theme_minimal_grid(font_size = 10)+
  coord_flip()+
  theme(legend.position = "none", plot.margin = margin(2, 2, 2, 2, "cm"), axis.text.y = element_text(face = "italic"))+
  labs(x = "", y = "Number of strains", title = "Pyricularia spp.")
  
p_py
  
  


```

### Strains by lineages


```{r echo=FALSE, layout="l-body-outset"}
library(janitor)

p_lin <- wb_all %>% 
  filter(py_lineage != "NA") %>% 
  tabyl(py_lineage) %>% 
    ggplot(aes(reorder(py_lineage, n), n))+
  geom_col(fill = "#558796")+
  geom_text(aes(reorder(py_lineage, n), n, label = n), size = 2, hjust = -0.1) +
  theme_minimal_grid(font_size = 10)+
  coord_flip()+
  theme(legend.position = "none", plot.margin = margin(2, 2, 2, 2, "cm"))+
  labs(x = "", y = "Number of strains", title = "P. oryzae lineages")
  
p_lin
  
  


```
